articles.author: Kylie Atwood, Evan Perez and Jennifer Hansler, CNN
articles.title: CNN Exclusive: Biden administration offers convicted Russian arms dealer in exchange for Griner, Whelan - CNN
articles.description: After months of internal debate, the Biden administration has offered to exchange Viktor Bout, a convicted Russian arms trafficker serving a 25-year US prison sentence, as part of a potential deal to secure the release of two Americans held by Russia, Brittne…

articles.author: Matthew Lee And Eric Tucker
articles.title: In rare contact, US offers Russia deal for Griner, Whelan - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: The Biden administration has offered a deal to Russia aimed at bringing home WNBA star Brittney Griner and another jailed American Paul Whelan, Secretary of State Antony Blinken said Wednesday.
